[DESCRIPTION]
A collection of games Ratchet & Clank on Playstation 2 platform

Ratchet & Clank is a feisty 2D platformer released only in the version for the PlayStation 2 Heroes of the title game produced by the studio Insomniac Games are fox and the robot who must save the galaxy Solana against the cunning machinations of the highest President Drek . During the game , players can acquire new weapons and equipment to help overcome the following obstacles and enemies.

Ratchet & Clank is one of the most polished platforming that appeared on the consoles . Great graphics goes hand in hand with fun and addictive gameplay .

The game takes place in Ratchet , a figure resembling a cat , but armed with a gun i .. his companion Clank - a little robot . Clank during some stages becomes a playable character , due to its size can get to places inaccessible to Ratchet . A pair of main characters fits together perfectly , like it was in the game Jak & Daxter .
